title: Game randomly stops responding to my inputs.
body: Every game I've played for the last four patches or so, I've had times where my character will stop responding to my inputs in the game for upwards of 10 seconds, severely ruining my chances of having fun and doing well in-game. Any way someone could shed some light on this problem? (only happens in this game, every other game i play is fine.)

replies.body:
What you're describing when your character ignores your inputs but everything else seems to move normally sounds a lot like packet loss. This is when your connection to our servers losses bits of data here and there, which can cause some really weird stuff to happen. 

Take your most recent game logs, and pop them into our [**Log Reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take a screenshot or post that info here and we'll be able to know for sure!

> Take your most recent game logs, and pop them into our [**Log Reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Take a screenshot or post that info here and we'll be able to know for sure!

"Your average ping was 48 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 94ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.

PACKET LOSS OVER TIME
 
Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 1.68%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss."

So it is packet loss, but it still is kinda weird how it only happens when I'm playing league, and no other game.

It may suck, but it's not unusual to have some packet loss with only certain servers. Your network might be having a hard time sending all of the data to our game servers for some reason. Let's take a minute to go through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can narrow down what's impacting your connection to our servers.
